text: Drake University is a private, co-educational university. It is located in Des Moines, Iowa, United States. The institution offers a number of undergraduate and graduate programs, as well as professional programs in business, law and pharmacy. Drake's law school is among the twenty-five oldest in the country. ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Iowa Category:Des Moines, Iowa Category:1881 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Iowa
title: Drake University
